author: Willy
content:
To me they are using the wrong cutter for the job. Past wrecks that were cut up used a wire rope with fastened lugs. At least it is what the CIA used to cut up the russian sub. 17:44 has the cable in use.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uQJ6IMREvz8

Tho the use of explosives sounds more like deperation than a plan.
